title: Ep. 236: DIY Gel Manicures, the CROWN Act & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:title: Ep. 236: DIY Gel Manicures, the CROWN Act & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:subtitle: We share tips for doing a gel manicure at home and discuss how the U.S. is making progress on national legislation to prohibit race-based hair discrimination. Before that, Jess shares personal news, and we offer our take on the latest beauty headlines:...
description:
We share tips for doing a gel manicure at home and discuss how the U.S. is making progress on national legislation to prohibit race-based hair discrimination. Before that, Jess shares personal news, and we offer our take on the latest beauty headlines: an Estée Lauder serum is going into outer space, Gwyneth Paltrow is the face of Xeomin, Avon is launching a $1,200 perfume, the new season of Dr. 90210 features an all-female cast of plastic surgeons, and more. -- Want more of our beauty podcast? Episode Recaps & Notes: fatmascara.com/blog; Our Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Twitter: @fatmascara; Email: info@fatmascara.com; To Leave a Voicemail & Be Featured on a Future Episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
